briefdescription.para: Reads the current timer value from the WDT32 peripheral.

detaileddescription.para: This function retrieves the current value of the timer register in the specified WDT32 peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to a variable where the current timer value will be stored.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: Sets the reload value in the WDT32 peripheral.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets the reload value in the load register of the specified WDT32 peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.
The value to be loaded into the WDT32 reload register.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: Gets the raw interrupt status (RIS) from the WDT32 peripheral.

detaileddescription.para: This function retrieves the raw interrupt status (RIS) from the specified WDT32 peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to a variable where the RIS value will be stored.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: Gets the masked interrupt status (MIS) from the WDT32 peripheral.

detaileddescription.para: This function retrieves the masked interrupt status (MIS) from the specified WDT32 peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to a variable where the MIS value will be stored.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: Sets the interrupt mask (IM) in the WDT32 peripheral.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets the interrupt mask (IM) register in the specified WDT32 peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.
The value to be written to the interrupt mask (IM) register.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: Gets the interrupt mask (IM) from the WDT32 peripheral.

detaileddescription.para: This function retrieves the interrupt mask (IM) from the specified WDT32 peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to a variable where the IM value will be stored.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: Sets the interrupt clear (IC) register in the WDT32 peripheral.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets the interrupt clear (IC) register in the specified WDT32 peripheral to clear interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.
The value to be written to the interrupt clear (IC) register.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: Sets the GCLK enable bit for the specified WDT32 peripheral.

detaileddescription.para: This function enables or disables the GCLK for the WDT32 peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.
The value to set (0 to disable, 1 to enable).

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets the enable bit in the control register of the WDT32 peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

detaileddescription.para: This function clears the enable bit in the control register of the WDT32 peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: Reloads the WDT32 timer by disabling and re-enabling it.

detaileddescription.para: This function clears the timeout flag, disables the WDT32, and then re-enables it.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: Clears the timeout flag in the WDT32 peripheral.

detaileddescription.para: This function writes to the interrupt clear register (IC) to clear the WDT timeout flag.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: Checks if the WDT32 has timed out.

detaileddescription.para: This function reads the raw interrupt status (RIS) to determine if a timeout has occurred.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the WDT32 base address structure EF_WDT32_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to a variable where the timeout status will be stored (1 if timeout, 0 otherwise).

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code.

briefdescription.para: C file for WDT32 APIs which contains the function implmentations.
